
{{Client event}} 
This event is triggered before GTA renders the HUD. This is particularly useful if you want to use [[/dxUpdateScreenSource.md|dxUpdateScreenSource]] to capture the screen onto a texture without capturing the HUD, or to alter HUD textures using [[/Element/Shader.md|shaders]] before they are drawn onto the screen.

==Parameters==
''None''

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the client's [[/root element.md|root element]].

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local render_count = 0

addEventHandler("onClientHUDRender", root, function()
	render_count = render_count + 1
end)

addEventHandler("onClientRender", root, function()
	render_count = render_count - 1
end)

addCommandHandler("getLossFrames", function()
	outputChatBox("Loss: "..render_count)
	outputDebugString("Loss: "..render_count, 3, 255, 0, 0)
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
